VISUALFORCE B2B COMMERCE RELEASE NOTES AND UPGRADE GUIDE
Promotions: Provide Consistent Experiences Across Devices

Promote your products across all user experiences, no matter which device screen size your buyers are using. When you create promotions for a Bootstrap 3 storefront, B2B Commerce for Visualforce now shows the promotions on any screen size.

Where: This change applies to B2B Commerce for Visualforce Summer ’19 (version 4.11) in Lightning Experience and Salesforce Classic in Enterprise, Performance, Unlimited, and Developer editions.

Why: Previous versions of B2B Commerce for Visualforce showed a Bootstrap 3 storefront's promotion on mobile devices only when the promotion's Location Type was Splash. For any other Location Type value, the promotion didn't display on mobile devices.

This change adds mobile support for Location Type values of Banner, Left Nav, or Right Nav.

How: After your upgrade the managed package, the following Handlebars templates are updated to responsively show promotions for all screen sizes:

promo-desktop-template
promo-desktop-template-centerColumn

Update your theme's CSS to style promotions for mobile device screen sizes. For an example implementation, check out the updated CC_Theme_Capricorn static resource that B2B Commerce for Visualforce installs.

NOTE This change doesn't affect storefronts that use the classic interface for page templates. These storefronts can already display promotions on mobile devices by creating CC Promotion records where Location Type is Splash Phone or Mobile. These Location Type values aren't compatible with the Bootstrap 3 interface.
